data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Yazd.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yazd, Iran

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Yazd, Iran find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,117,195, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 5,931 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Yazd.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Soi people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Yazd, Iran so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Yazd, Iran.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the 5,931 believers in Yazd to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

location.name: Yazd
location.people_groups_list: Koroshi, Fars, Southwestern, Gabri, Dari, Fars, Northwestern, Nayini
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Koroshi (400), Fars, Southwestern (111,000), Gabri, Dari (15,000), Fars, Northwestern (8,800), Nayini (8,900)
